chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is iPhone 12 mini and it has the above problem:
The phone has issues as seen on the pictures, it shouldn't normally have.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The costumer has encountered the following problem with his item: scratches on the body (please take a look at the pictures).

The customer would like a partial refund of 40€

This is the amount pre-defined at QC for the difference between ‘Mint’ and ‘Very Good’.

For information purposes only. We will take care of the partial refund.


Regards,
Mario from the Back Care Team
